doctor.name: Dr. Hasnina Akter
doctor.info: Dr. Hasnina Akter is a Cancer Specialist in Chattogram. Her qualification is MBBS, MPhil (Radiotherapy). She is a Consultant, Cancer Care Centre at Evercare Hospital, Chattogram.She is expert in advanced Radiotherapy Treatment (IMRT, VMAT, SRS) and did advance Radiotherapy Training in India ( Chennai, Hyderabad). She is also a Consultant of Breast Clinic (every Wednesday) special wings of breast cancer patient. She regularly provides treatment (Radiotherapy and chemotherapy) to her patients at Evercare Hospital Chattogram. Practicing hour of Dr. Hasnina Akter at Evercare Hospital Chattogram is 9am to 5pm (Closed: Friday).
